Package index

Query media metadata

Obtain media metadata from various biodiversity repositories

query_gbif()
Access 'gbif' recordings and metadata
query_inaturalist()
Access 'inaturalist' recordings and metadata
query_macaulay()
Searches for media files in the Macaulay Library
query_observation()
Access 'observation' recordings and metadata
query_wikiaves()
Access 'Wikiaves' recordings and metadata
query_xenocanto()
Access 'Xeno-Canto' recordings and metadata

Obtain media files

Download media files from repositories

download_media()
Download media files from repositories

Handle query metadata

Data exploration and manipulation

update_query()
Access 'observation' recordings and metadata
map_locations()
Maps of instances of observations by species
merge_query_results()
Detect duplicate observations in suwo query results

Misellaneous

Additional functions

check_gbif_datasets()
Access 'gbif' dataset information
